content: there s not much that is more basic than a cowl - a simple tube of fabric large enough to pull over your head and rest around your neck cowls are a great way to use up a lonely stray ball of yarn experiment with a new stitch pattern or keep your hands busy during a movie they re so fast to make that they re ideal last-minute gifts this single-skein cowl is simple and speedy with alternating bands of single and double_crochet forming a subtly interesting texture that requires only bare attention from you to navigate successfully
